Description: Concrete Structures Design Drawing Set - structural CAD drafting (22 sheets)
Notes: Allowance for drawing production without vendor quotes; includes foundations containment walls equipment pads reinforcement

Description: Concrete Structures Technical Specification - specification writing (3 specifications)
Notes: Allowance for concrete reinforcement formwork specifications

Description: Concrete Structures Design Calculations - structural engineering (foundation containment seismic)
Notes: Allowance for design calculations including tank foundations containment walls seismic analysis

Description: Installation & Test Records - QA/QC documentation and coordination
Notes: Allowance for concrete pour records cylinder test coordination rebar inspection records

Description: Tank Foundation Concrete - ready-mix supply for 3x15000 MT tank ring walls
Notes: 450 m3 derived from 3 tanks x 150 m3 each; ring wall type per D-011

Description: Tank Foundation Installation - concrete placement forming curing
Notes: Installation rate for slab/foundation work

Description: Containment Wall Concrete - high-quality ready-mix for secondary containment
Notes: 600 m3 for perimeter walls supporting OBJ-7 Environmental Protection; premium mix for low permeability

Description: Containment Wall Installation - concrete placement with waterstops complex formwork
Notes: Higher rate for wall construction with waterstops and containment-grade finishing

Description: Equipment Pad Concrete - ready-mix for pump metering railcar unloading pads
Notes: 200 m3 for various equipment pads; includes anchor bolt blockouts

Description: Equipment Pad Installation - concrete placement with anchor bolts and grout pockets
Notes: Installation includes precision anchor bolt placement

Description: Thrust Block Concrete - ready-mix for underground piping thrust blocks
Notes: 80 m3 for approximately 20 thrust block locations

Description: Thrust Block Installation - concrete placement in trench locations
Notes: Installation in excavated locations

Description: Reinforcing Steel Supply - fabricated rebar delivered (all structures)
Notes: 180 tonnes total; 100-150 kg/m3 ratio depending on element type

Description: Reinforcing Steel Installation - placement tying inspection
Notes: Installation labor for rebar placement

Description: Wall Formwork Materials - rental/purchase for containment walls
Notes: 1500 m2 contact area for containment wall faces

Description: Wall Formwork Installation - form erection stripping and cleaning
Notes: Formwork labor for wall construction

Description: Waterstops and Joint Materials - PVC waterstops sealants fillers
Notes: 600m of construction joints with waterstops for containment integrity

Description: Waterstop Installation - joint preparation waterstop placement sealing
Notes: Installation labor for waterstops and joint treatment

Description: Ground Liner Interface Materials - anchor curbs penetration details
Notes: Concrete curbs and penetration sealing for liner system interface

Description: Ground Liner Interface Installation - curb construction and penetration work
Notes: Installation of liner anchor system and penetration details

Description: Concrete Testing and Quality Control - cylinder testing field QC third-party inspection
Notes: Testing program for 1330 m3 concrete; includes lab and field testing

Description: Construction Indirects - field supervision site overhead QA/QC (factor-based)
Notes: 18% of CD base ($803
column15: 800 CD x 0.18); factor from fallback model

Description: EPCM / Project Management - PKG-05 allocation (factor-based)
Procurement Services - vendor coordination expediting (factor-based)
Notes: 2% of MAT = 2% x $850
